full_summary:
### Janitorial Services at Trois-Rivières Hovercraft Base

**Tender Solicitation Number**: 30003821
**Tender Status**: Expired
**Solicitation Date**: February 16, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: March 17, 2023 (expired)

**Description**

The Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) requires the services of a contractor to provide janitorial services at the Trois-Rivières Hovercraft Base in Quebec, Canada. The contractor will be responsible for maintaining the cleanliness of the 2,309.50 square meters of hovercraft hangars and 702.58 square meters of offices, mechanics room, and warehouse on a daily, monthly, and yearly basis.

**Background**
The base is a 24/7 operational facility with a majority of employees on site during regular working hours. The contractor will need to have skilled labor and necessary equipment to perform the cleaning tasks effectively.

**Security Requirements**
The contractor personnel requiring access to sensitive work sites must hold a valid Reliability Status, granted or approved by the Canadian Industrial Security Directorate/ Public Works and Government Services Canada (CISD/PWGSC).

**Trade Agreements**
The requirement is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Period of Contract**
The period of contract shall be from the date of award to January 31, 2024, with an option to exercise three (3) one-year periods.
